mapper.select: select p.name,p.price ,p.th_img ,p.productid,p.sub_id, s.main_id,p.inputdate,round(nvl(avg(r.star_score),0),1) starScoreAvg , nvl(count(r.reviewid),0) reviewcnt from product p ,order_detail o, review r ,sub_category s where p.productid=o.productid(+) and o.order_detailid=r.order_detailid(+) and p.sub_id = s.sub_id(+) and s.main_id=#{s.main_id} group by p.name,p.price ,p.th_img ,p.productid,p.sub_id, s.main_id,p.inputdate order by p.inputdate desc offset #{pageFlag} rows fetch next 8 rows only
